welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sannois, France! Located in the picturesque Val d'Oise region, this charming city is known for its beautiful parks and historic buildings. We invite you to explore and experience all that Sannois has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and business aviation, providing luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G) and serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for 2 hours. After that, a fee may apply.
